General.Name: TOC Co. Ltd
General.Description: TOC Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate business in Japan. It leases wholesale and retail spaces, office buildings, parking lots, logistics centers, hotels, restaurants, and event halls. The company is also involved in the pharmaceutical, sports club and hot bath facility, electronic commerce and information processing, and linen supply and laundry businesses; sells flower display products; and provides building management related services. In addition, it engages in the manufacture and sale of overhead wire hardware products for power distribution and communication lines, cable hardware products for CATV and disaster prevention radio, tacks, etc. Further, the company is involved in the real estate ownership, management, and brokerage activities; and operation and management of parking lots. TOC Co., Ltd. was founded in 1923 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

2.Name: Mr. Shoichi  Kondo
2.Title: MD, GM of Building Facilities Management Department & Director
